## ColorUtils.getAlphaFromHex() function

Retrieves alpha color channel from hex encoded color value.

 getHexFromRgba.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function getAlphaFromHex(hex: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  hex | number | The number encoded color value (representable as 0xRRGGBB or 0xTTRRGGBB in hex). |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The floating point alpha component in &lt;<!-- -->0, 1<!-- -->&gt; range.
